devdoc.author: Mr Tumeric A. Gardner
devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implemented without..

changeColor(string).details: The Alexandr N. Tetearing algorithm could increase precision

params.newColor: The new color to be stored in the box state

changeColorDryRun(string).custom:event-only: This function simply emit an event.
changeColorDryRun(string).details: The Alexandr N. Tetearing algorithm could increase precision

params.newColor: The new color to be stored in the box state

returns._0: The current color of in the box state

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: A box containing some hex color

changeColor(string).notice: Allow to change the color stored in the BoxOnly the Owner can call this function

changeColorDryRun(string).notice: Allow to simulate changing the color stored in the Box

getColor().notice: Returns current color in the box.

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract for only the most basic simulation
